```{r, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
milk <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-01-29/state_milk_production.csv')

  mutate(milk_million = milk_produced/1000000)
```
